channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge sets hearing on $1 million-a-day sweepstakes from Elon Musk's PAC
item.description: A Philadelphia judge has set a hearing Thursday morning in the city prosecutor's bid to shut down Elon Musk's $1 million-a-day sweepstakes in battlegr...

item.title: The Strongest Trump We’ve Ever Seen
item.description: After everything, he’s gained ground from his previous runs.

item.title: Inventive Ways to Survive Cancellation and Censorship
item.description: A revolutionary Irishman provides inspiration for how to handle present-day suppression of views.

item.title: Jim Jordan says YouTube 'censored' Joe Rogan interview with Trump
item.description: House Judiciary Chairman Jim Jordan is investigating accusations that YouTube "censored" Joe Rogan's interview with former President Trump.

item.title: What Will the Election Mean for Antitrust?
item.description: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump might recognize the danger of overregulation. Or they might give in to ideology and personal spats.

item.title: Noncitizen ID Can Be Used To Vote, Says Proposed Wisconsin Election Commission Guidance
item.description: The feckless state elections regulator plans to issue guidance on temporary visitor IDs, a potential election integrity problem for years.

item.title: Caroleene Dobson’s Unusual House Race in Alabama
item.description: A competitive race in a racially gerrymandered district could decide the House majority.

item.title: Early in-person voting launches in Kentucky, last day of early voting in Maryland
item.description: Early in-person voting began Thursday in Kentucky as voters head to the polls across the country.

item.title: Pennsylvania Democratic Party sues Erie County over 10,000-20,000 missing mail-in ballots
item.description: Pennsylvania's Democratic Party sued the Erie County Board of Elections on Wednesday over "numerous issues related to the mail-in voting process."

item.title: Trump stop in blue-leaning state could boost Republican bid to flip Democrat-held Senate seat
item.description: Donald Trump's stop in blue leaning New Mexico on Thursday could help the state's Republican Senate nominee help flip a Democratic held seat

item.title: Days Out from the Election, Trump’s Chances Have Never Looked Better
item.description: Trump’s team is cautiously optimistic, while some supporters are already predicting a landslide.

item.title: Harris picks up endorsements from New Hampshire Republicans 6 days before election
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris picked up endorsements from three longtime Republican leaders as her campaign welcomes a surge of Republican support six ...

item.title: Biden finalizes crackdown on US military tech investments in China with one week to lame duck session
item.description: The Treasury Department finalized a crackdown that will prevent U.S. companies and citizens from investing in the development of military technologies...

item.title: Dem Candidate For N.C. Governor Won’t Condemn Biden, Harris For Calling Trump Supporters ‘Garbage’ And Nazis
item.description: Stein's silence comes after Democrat Party leaders have been defaming Trump and his supporters for weeks.

item.title: Elon Musk Launches Investigation After The Federalist Exposed Harris Campaign’s Social Media Manipulation
item.description: Elon Musk announced his team is investigating Vice President Kamala Harris' manipulation of social media to inflate her online support.
